Title: Rickmancing the Stone
Writer: Dan Harmon (created by), Justin Roiland (created by), Jane Becker, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Jessica Gao (executive story editor), Sarah Carbiener (story editor), Erica Rosbe (story editor)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: With the kids dealing with their parents' divorce, Rick takes them to a Mad Max-style universe where he tries to steal a green crystal from a group of scavengers.
